title: Inclusive Education Design in Spanish Universities: Case Studies in Science Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Need to establish inclusive educational environments considering accessibility for all learners, including students with disabilities, in science curricula

learning_goals: Learners can propose three or more inclusive strategies for conducting science projects while collaborating with students with various types of disabilities.
Learners can modify science experiment assessment methods into two types by applying Universal Design for Learning (UDL) principles.
Learners can design science data visualization materials to be 100% accessible using assistive technology tools (e.g., screen readers, magnification software).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
